negative_prompt: A turtle on top of a skateboard
long_prompt: A vibrant skateboard with a wooden deck and black metal trucks sits within the shell of a slow-moving turtle, its wheels partially submerged in the water of a tranquil pond.
A skateboard with intricate graphic designs lies within a shelled turtle, its wheels resting on the turtle's bony feet as it bobs gently in a shallow pond, its eyes peering out at the world beyond.
A skateboard lies within the shell of a slow-moving turtle on a warm beach, its wheels partially buried in the sand, as the turtle's head rests peacefully on the surface.
negative_long_prompt: A slow-moving turtle gently sits atop a vibrant skateboard with a wooden deck and black metal trucks, its shell resting on the wheels of the board in a peaceful, sunlit pond.
A turtle shelled by time lies within a skateboard, its bony feet resting on the skateboard's deck as it bobs gently in a shallow pond, its eyes peering out at the world beyond.
A slow-moving turtle and a bright red skateboard rest side by side on a sunny beach, the turtle's shell partially covering the skateboard, as the sun casts gentle shadows across the scene.
